mapper.update: update video_reply set vr_delete=1 where vr_num=#{vr_num}
update video_reply set vr_content=#{vr_content},vr_regdate=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') where vr_num=#{vr_num}
mapper.select: select * from( select vr.*,m.id,aa.vrucnt,rownum rnum from video_reply vr,member m, (select vr.vr_num, count(vru.vr_num) vrucnt from video_reply vr, video_reply_up vru where vr.vr_num=vru.vr_num(+) group by vr.vr_num order by vr.vr_num desc) aa where vr.vr_num=aa.vr_num and vr.m_num=m.m_num and vr.vr_delete=0 and vr.v_num=#{v_num}) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
select count(*) from video_reply where v_num=#{v_num} and vr_delete=0
